Qieyun: 見開一唐入?, 見開二庚入?
English: to come to; to reach. to correct. a rule; a pattern
to rely upon; to trust to
to drop; to leak; to let out; to escape
to hand down; to leave behind.

Qieyun: 明三陽平?, 明三陽去?
English: to gaze at; to expect; to hope. the 15th day of the moon (when the mooon is full) because on that day the moon faces the sun
to recompense; to report; to inform

Qieyun: 來合三眞平?, 來合一魂平?, 來合一魂去?
English: to discourse; to discuss; to reason

Qieyun: 定開四齊平?, 定開四齊去?
English: the forehead. a theme; a thesis;.to raise
to raise the question; to discuss
